ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent follow-up encounters within 6 months of the initial encounter.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Encounter. The intent of this data element is to represent 6 month follow-up visits.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with capturing the follow-up encounters between 1 day to 6 months of the initial finding.),(Exclusion Criteria: No Exclusions.)
